bugs.title: netpbm sources contains bunndled jbigkit and jasper libraries

bugzilla.short_desc: netpbm sources contains bunndled jbigkit and jasper libraries

long_desc.thetext: It seems that netpbm sources contains bunndled jbigkit and jasper libraries. Please consider either using system-wide versions of these libraries or add necessary "Provides: bundled(..)" directives.

Thank you for your report.

I have sent info to upstream authors. 
Depends on their answer, I will modify spec file or source code.

Description of problem: Bug 1219743 erroneously reported some sort of "legal issue" with the copyright description file. This file is shipped in Debian, Arch, Ubuntu, and other distributions. It only contains the copyright text regarding each piece of netpbm. The GPL text is not enough to describe the code contained in netpbm.


Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): netpbm-10.76.00-2


Please add this file back to the %license block.

bugs.title: CVE-2017-2586 CVE-2017-2587 CVE-2017-5849 netpbm: various flaws [fedora-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2017-2586 CVE-2017-2587 CVE-2017-5849 netpbm: various flaws [fedora-all]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2017-2586 netpbm: Null pointer dereference in stringToUint function

long_desc.thetext:
A null pointer dereference vulnerability was found in netpbm. A maliciously crafted SVG file could cause the application to crash.

References:

http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2017/q1/317

Acknowledgments:

Name: chunibalon (VARAS@IIE)

Created netpbm tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1419545]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2017-2587 netpbm: Insufficient size check of memory allocation in createCanvas() function

long_desc.thetext:
A memory allocation vulnerability was found in netpbm. A maliciously crafted SVG file could cause the application to crash.

References:

http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2017/q1/317

Acknowledgments:

Name: chunibalon (VARAS@IIE)

Created netpbm tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1419545]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2017-5849 netpbm: Calls TIFFRGBA with width and height parameters switched

long_desc.thetext:
An out of bounds read and write issue was found in netpbm. A maliciously crafted file could cause the application to crash or possibly have other unspecified impact.

References:

http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2017/q1/234

Upstream bugs:

http://bugzilla.maptools.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2654
http://bugzilla.maptools.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2655

This is an automatically created tracking bug!  It was created to ensure
that one or more security vulnerabilities are fixed in affected versions
of fedora-all.

For comments that are specific to the vulnerability please use bugs filed
against the "Security Response" product referenced in the "Blocks" field.

For more information see:
http://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Security/TrackingBugs

When submitting as an update, use the fedpkg template provided in the next
comment(s).  This will include the bug IDs of this tracking bug as well as
the relevant top-level CVE bugs.

Please also mention the CVE IDs being fixed in the RPM changelog and the
fedpkg commit message.

NOTE: this issue affects multiple supported versions of Fedora. While only
one tracking bug has been filed, please correct all affected versions at
the same time.  If you need to fix the versions independent of each other,
you may clone this bug as appropriate.

Created attachment 1248614
patch for CVE-2017-2586

Created attachment 1248615
patch for CVE-2017-2587

Created attachment 1248616
patch for CVE-2017-5849

comments.text: This update has been submitted for testing by jridky.
This update has obsoleted [netpbm-10.77.00-2.fc24](https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-f6082f9bf8), and has inherited its bugs and notes.
This update has been pushed to testing.
This update has reached 7 days in testing and can be pushed to stable now if the maintainer wishes
This update has been submitted for stable by jridky.
This update has been pushed to stable.

notes:
Security fix for  CVE-2017-2586, CVE-2017-2587 and CVE-2017-5849,  

----

Add license information file copyright_summary

----

New version of netpbm is available (10.77.00)

----

add missing directives about bundled libraries jasper and jbigkit

----

New version of netpbm is available (10.76.00)
title: netpbm-10.77.00-3.fc24
